title: Why Insurance is Important to Everyone (Managing Your Personal Finances)
author: Joe Watson
comment: Do you have insurance cover and policies or what do you think about insurance?
description:
In this video, I talk about the importance of insurance in personal finances and why insurance is important to everyone.

Having proper insurance cover and policies can provide you peace of mind. You can also consider insurance as an investment.

The key role of insurance is to protect you against unexpected events in your life. Some of the insurance covers or policies to consider include term insurance, property insurance, education policies and endowment plans.

It is important to talk to your insurance broker, insurance advisor or provider to provide you with advise on the best insurance policy. You will also get insurance quotes.

This is all related to have insurance as part of your personal financial plan.
